Title: Tortured Souls
Plot: Shirley asks Alan Shore to use his odious lawyering to help her defend a police officer accused of torture. Donny Crane returns and is the opposing counsel in Denny's case, with Chelina Hall as second chair, where a woman wants to sue her former boyfriend for    saying no to her at the alter.  For Denny, this is an easy case, for Donny this is to settle a score with Denny for letting him believe for 25 years that he was his father.
